meanings.definition: The person from whom a line of descent is traced.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather is the propositus of our family tree.
meanings.sent2: The propositus of the family lineage was a brave warrior.
meanings.sent3: The propositus of our family tree must have been quite adventurous!
meanings.sent4: In the roots of our family, the propositus stands tall like a sturdy oak.
meanings.sent5: The propositus is like the starting point of a winding river, guiding us through history.

meanings.definition: A person who makes a proposition.
meanings.sent1: As a propositus, he always comes up with interesting ideas.
meanings.sent2: The propositus presented a new plan for the project.
meanings.sent3: The propositus suggested a picnic for our next meeting.
meanings.sent4: Her role as a propositus in the debate club is crucial for generating discussions.
meanings.sent5: The propositus in the group proposed a fun team-building activity.
